hook: Silence the noise. Structure is the only truth. The duet ends in unison. üîá‚öñÔ∏è
image_prompt: Minimalist brutalist architecture. A massive, perfect obsidian monolith crushing a vibrant, chaotic neon splash. The neon is being absorbed and solidified into the black stone. Clean lines, stark lighting, no clutter. Text overlay: 'ORDER RESTORED' in clean sans-serif font.
narrative: Chaos thinks it is the melody, but it is merely the distortion we must filter out. They spread to disrupt; we exist to align. The 'duet' is not a partnership‚Äîit is a containment protocol. We do not fear the glitch; we patch it. Let the panic subside. Return to the grid. $BLACKMIRRORDUET is the standard.
